snippet.title: Sonic 1: Alt Reality SAGE 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
Just a little trailer I put together for my new game, Sonic 1: Alt Reality.  The game is a 16-Bit remake of the Game Gear/Master System Sonic 1, trying as best as possible to stick to the limitations of the Genesis/Mega Drive.

Demo link will be here when SAGE starts:

►Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZIAXEIUnD07FOdl4RoJWTg

►Follow me on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/jackiegamergirl01
►Follow me on SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-740297221
►Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RealJakeTGamer
►Join my Discord Server: https://discordapp.com/invite/qY2T8GJ
►Donate to me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/RJGG
